articles.title: England's Gareth Southgate 'likes the USA as a future destination' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 52-year-old revealed he will not rush into a decision on his future as Three Lions manager following their disappointing World Cup quarterfinal defeat by France on Saturday.
articles.content:
England coach Gareth Southgate reportedly likes the United States as a possible landing spot.
